event.name: Mission Briefing
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Eaton Command, do you read us?^Thank goodness you got the distress call. We have a situation here.^^The TSN Surprise broke down while laying a minefield for us. They put in a call for repairs just as we started experiencing...weird effects.^^Sensors are operating at minimal efficiency, our shields are draining, and comms are being disrupted intermittently. We need you to help sort this out and protect both the station and the Surprise until they are operational.^^Skarran and allied forces have been seen in the vicinity.

event.name: Frequency message and Set Comms Buttons
event.incoming_comms_text: The science team has just picked up some reflected transmissions, and the base computers have analyzed them as Skarran operating commands--for something nearby.^^The techs aren't sure what the transmissions are for yet, but have figured out a way to disrupt the signals.^^We're sending you some output frequencies now. If you can get in range to use them, it should help restore operations back to normal.^^Be warned--the techs say they don't know what other effects using the frequencies may have.^^Also, only one frequency can be used at a time.^^Good luck.

set_ship_text.scan_desc: Remote Shield Drain. Proximity Scan Required (800m)
Active Sensor Scrambling. Proximity Scan Required (800m)

folder_arme.name: Re Spawn Mine Clearers per player

event.name: Station Side Interference
event.incoming_comms_text: Alert! Incoming comms channels have been scrambled!^^Do not approach the station or TSN Surprise until communications are re-established. ^^All unidentified vessels will be destroyed.

event.name: Production Interference
event.incoming_comms_text: Very well--we'll stop all production if that's what you want!

event.name: Station Side Interference Scanned
event.incoming_comms_text: Alert! Incoming comms channels have been scrambled!^^Do not approach the station or TSN Surprise until communications are re-established. ^^All unidentified vessels will be destroyed.

event.name: Production Interference Scanned
event.incoming_comms_text: We are getting conflicting messages about what to build and whether to fire.^^Production is halted until we sort it out.

big_message.title: Defeat!
big_message.subtitle2: The sector falls into enemy hands.

big_message.title: Phyrric Victory.
big_message.subtitle2: The starbase and the TSN Surprise were destroyed.

big_message.title: Victory!
big_message.subtitle2: The TSN Surprise was repaired and the starbase preserved.

big_message.title: Partial Victory!
big_message.subtitle2: The TSN Surprise was saved, but you lost the station.

big_message.title: Partial Victory!
big_message.subtitle2: The TSN Surprise was lost, but you saved the station.
